title: Drawing, "Designs for the Galician Center of Contemporary Art, Santiago de Compostela, Spain", 1988–93
inscribed: Inscribed in black ball point pen:  numerous notations (in Portuguese) in the upper half of the sheet, to be translated at a later date; in red color pencil, lower right corner: 22.0988 (architect's inventory number)
provenance: Max Protetch Gallery, New York, NY; Alvara Siza
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of George A. Hearn
description: Approximately seventeen individual studies of the exterior of the museum building from the south-west looking east.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for the Galician Center of Contemporary Art, Santiago de Compostela, Spain", 1988–93.
1988–93. Black ball-point on cream (loose-leaf) paper. Museum purchase through gift of George A. Hearn. 2004-5-1.
